q: he works on "strategic projects, in particular working on new products"( Eric Schmidt ). So what will Eric Schmidt be doing now that he is no longer CEO? He is Executive Chairman: As Executive Chairman, I will focus wherever I can add the greatest value: externally, on the deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership that are increasingly important given Google's global reach; and internally as an advisor to Larry and Sergey Brin .

better riders and better friends." For the managing director of Global Action Sports, David Letterman Porra, the show, and the antics of Travis Pastrana , needs to be seen to be believed. Travis Pastrana is the greatest action sports star on the planet and to have him performing live at venues around New Zealand for the very first time is a massive coup for all of his fans there, said Porra. war on "too many hands on the steering wheel." Donald Rumsfeld , who served as President Bush 's defense chief for six years after holding the same job under president Gerald Ford in the 1970s, acknowledged that in a war, many things cost lives. But he had no regrets about his leadership of the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan- the latter now nearing its 10th anniversary. He refused to echo the regrets of another domineering defense secretary-

official Steve Javie , who ejected him. "I thought I got fouled on that play, and I said I thought that he was calling the game personal, and he threw me out," Allen Iverson said. His fuse is real short anyway, and I should have known that I couldn't say anything anyway. It's been something personal with me and him since I got in the league. This was just the perfect game for him to try and make me look bad.
